title: Week 1 Preview: Broncos vs. Seahawks, Cowboys vs. Bucs, and More
description:
Danny Heifetz, Ben Solak, and Steven Ruiz preview Week 1, starting with the 'Monday Night Football' matchup between the Broncos and Seahawks (0:56). Then, they discuss what the headlines will be on Monday morning after Cowboys-Bucs, Raiders-Chargers, and more (26:15).

Hosts: Danny Heifetz, Ben Solak, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
